dbTables.users: create table users (user_id int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, user_name varchar(255) not null, user_email varchar(255) not null UNIQUE, user_role SMALLINT not null, user_password varchar(255) not null, user_salt varchar(255) not null)
dbTables.product: create table product (product_id int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, product_name varchar(255) not null, product_price decimal NOT null, product_description varchar(5000) not null)
dbTables.orderedproduct: create table ordered_product (order_id int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id int references users(user_id), product_id int references product(product_id))
